item.description:
Let's hit the Rosebud to hear a great band, Wall of Sound (founded by one of our members, Juro.)

Here's the band's bio from their ReverbNation page:

"We are an ensemble of experienced musicians coming from all different directions crossing the streams to do it right this time - focusing first on cover song boot camp then graduating to our own creativity once we are seasoned road warriors on top of our chops. Come support us, we'll pay you back double by putting it out there with everything we've got every single night."

Check out the band's Facebook page, too.

Wall of Sound follows Sweet Soubrette, a very cool indie band from Brooklyn. Here is a description of the band that comes from Rock NYC:

"Take Amanda Palmer covering Radiohead and then take Phoebe Legere and drain out the jazz and replace it with Jenny Lewis circa The Execution Of All Things and then throw on some fishnet stockings and you have Sweet Soubrette...this time she has a full band and the songs have texture and beauty."

See you at the show.

Details:

  • If you haven't been to Rosebud Bar, it's behind the Rosebud Diner.  Just go to the right of the diner and follow the path.
  • Cover is typically $5 at the door.
  • As noted above, I look like my profile picture.  I'll be hanging at the bar and I'll also email my cell # to all Yes and Maybe RSVPers the afternoon of the show.
  • Check out this Rosebud page for information about T & bus routes and a map.
  • This is a joint meetup with the Fun with Alcohol, and Cambridge-Somerville Live Music meetup groups.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my profile picture. It's a small place.
item.name: Wall of Sound Band w/Sweet Soubrette
